title: Pretty Time of Day
text: hms package provides simple class storing durations time--day values displaying hh:mm:ss format. class intended simplify data exchange databases, spreadsheets, data sources: Stores values numeric vector contains number seconds since midnight Supports construction explicit hour, minute, second values Supports coercion various data types, including POSIXt Can used column data frame Based difftime class Values can exceed 24-hour boundary negative default, fractional seconds microsecond displayed, regardless value "digits.secs" option

title: A simple class for storing time-of-day values — hms
text: values stored difftime vector custom class, always "seconds" unit robust coercion numeric. Supports construction time values, coercion various data types, formatting.  Can used regular column data frame. hms() high-level constructor accepts second, minute, hour day components numeric vectors. new_hms() low-level constructor checks input correct base type, numeric. is_hms() checks object class hms. as_hms() generic supports conversions beyond casting. default method forwards vctrs::vec_cast().
